title: Birger Sandberg
text: Birger "Farsan" Sandberg (18 February 1918 – 28 June 1998) was a Swedish former <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and manager. He was <a href="Djurg%C3%A5rdens%20IF%20Fotboll">Djurgårdens IF</a> manager in 1959 together with <a href="Knut%20Hallberg">Knut Hallberg</a>.
